lenders.name: Patricia

lenders.name: Linda

lenders.name: Sandra

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I can't loan right now, because every day is a struggle to get by (just to afford rent and food), but I know the day will come when I graduate, and I'm better off, and I want to help people who can't get out of poverty by themselves.

lenders.name: David

lenders.name: Mason

lenders.name: Jane

lenders.name: Nicole & Doug

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: I think this can help people

lenders.name: Eve

lenders.name: Davide
lenders.loan_because: Traditional charity, while crucial, does not fundamentally relieve the ongoing need for people everywhere to be able to support themselves and their families. How do we not all profit from that?
lenders.occupational_info: I write medical education materials by day and bake to make the world a tastier place by night

lenders.name: Rhonda

lenders.name: Isaac K-W

lenders.loan_because: I loved the concept.

lenders.occupational_info: I build Websites.

lenders.name: Emi

lenders.name: CUBEX

Cubex is a small professional web design company dedicated to providing its customers with exceptional website design solutions.
Located in Amsterdam, we have worked with businesses and individuals across the world on both large and small projects for a number of years.
Our professional team at Cubex is geared at working with its customers to create new websites and other professional website design solutions. Here at Cubex, we have the passion for designing minimal, elegant and clean websites for customers.

lenders.loan_because: I grew up poor.

lenders.name: Mark

lenders.name: caroline
lenders.loan_because: as a person who became (and still is) temporarily disabled. i learned how difficult it is to become a productive member of society again without help. it's practically impossible and it's not because we dont' want to...i live in a country that gives me the financial help i need to get my power back. i am now choosing to be the financial help my brothers and sisters need but don't receive from their governments.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: Providing others with new opportunities that are empowering and mutually beneficial is one of the best things a person can do. lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Micro-financing goes to the people who need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I help government and companies keep their information assets secure.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I see my life as privileged. There are time when I have to struggle, but it is never as bad as it could be, nor as bad for me as it is for someone else. I loan because I spend money on frivialous things for my pleasure, and in order to keep my energies good I need to give to those who are in need. I loan because it is empowering and nothing is better than feeling and knowing you CAN do whatever you need or want to do with your life. I loan because it feels good to give back to someone, or some cause, that is greater than myself.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have many jobs... 
My first is as a Leasing Consultant. I rent apartment homes to people in the Philadelphia, PA area. 
My second is a Personal Assistant and Lifestyle Manager. This is a great job! I get to be involved with people's personal and professional lives by creating organizational freedom, time management abilities, and healthy lifestyle options for them. 

The third, is a wholesale fine jewelry representative. I sell a line of Silve, Gold, Murano Glass, and Crystal Jewelry to Fine Jewlery and Gift Stores in PA, NJ, and OH.

And, once a week, a take a couple of hours to clean houses. It is a good supplemental income, I love to clean, and it feels great to provide these people, my clients, with a clean and clutter free home.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of microfinancing and it feels good to give.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people with good intentions who are sincere and serious about obtaining their goals in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair cars and trucks for a Chrysler dealer.

lenders.name: Leon
lenders.loan_because:
We can help!!! 
Start-Up

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.occupational_info: I write software tools for Astronomers.

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of community
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a social worker, therapist, writer and artist.

lenders.loan_because: I can, and I like the idea of enabling enterprising people create a better life through their own initiative.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a natural resources geologist working to conserve water and soil resources and to improve the environment.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It's good to help people, help themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the finance department of a bank in London

lenders.name: Srinivas
lenders.loan_because: I would like to contribute to the aspirations of the small scale enterprenuers by assisting them to raise the finance to carry out their buisiness plan and at the same time get good return on my money invested.

lenders.occupation: Co-Founder of Health Retreat and Yoga Teacher
lenders.loan_because: It is important to help others to reach their fullest, most magnificent potential!

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I know how much of a difference a relatively small amount of capital can make to the success of a small business.
lenders.occupational_info: We support Apple Macintosh Computers

lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and should help others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are building a modern green new media company called G Living.  The worlds first G/Publishing Social Network.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do!!!!

lenders.name: Arthur Lui
lenders.loan_because:
I'm an entrepreneur myself and want to support others in creating thriving businesses and pulling themselves out of poverty.

Buy four Starbucks coffees or help an entrepreneur lift herself out of poverty. Hard decision?

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others-- in some small way-- to improve their quality of life and fulfill their aspirations
lenders.occupational_info: For the last 2 years, I've been researching legal issues, reviewing evidence, and writing first drafts of letters to clients.  I will take the bar exam in late July, and if I pass, I will be a lawyer.

lenders.name: Sandra & Rex Meyer
lenders.loan_because: People are in great need all over this earth! We give because we want them to be self sufficient and successful.

lenders.name: DougP
lenders.loan_because: People are the same every where, we all want the best for our families. KIVA makes it possible to add to the lives of people seeking that better life!

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: it is one of the ways I try to end poverty in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English and History to 13-year-old boys and girls.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help in any way that I can however small. I don't have much, but I can share what I have.

lenders.name: bruce mansour
lenders.loan_because: We make a living what we get, we make a life from what we give :)
lenders.occupational_info: I create and manage special events

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: What better way to use my money than to help others committed to helping their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work too much!

lenders.name: ANT
lenders.loan_because: people are important.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell jokes for a living.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I want to.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: A competitor once helped me through a stressful time and asked nothing in return except that I help those in need when I have the chance.....and now I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I now undertake charity work in the areas of childhood cancer and homeless youth.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people. I came from hard times, and people helped me, so now I try and give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit health care agency, and oversee several group homes for people with Mental Retardation and Mental Illness, and try and make a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: JUSTINE
lenders.loan_because: i really need a personal computer to start a desktop publishing shop and be able to provide my own needs thru a small scale business and also help other lowly income earners like me.
lenders.occupational_info: promote positive advertisements to other individuals and help overcome poverty

lenders.name: Christiansen Family
lenders.loan_because: My daughter and I know the world is a beautiful place, and we believe in supporting others to make all our lives better.

lenders.name: Shreekar Ranade
lenders.loan_because: Helping entrepreneurs at the lowest level of society is the best way to break the cycle of poverty. I lend responsibly because I believe the cycle of poverty can only end with hard work and a lucky break - no government handouts ever helped break a human's bond with poverty - only hard work will/did.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and manage systems and processes that enable businesses to operate efficiently. I am passionate about technology and the interaction of humans with technology.

lenders.name: Ed & Karen
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Ed Cooks, I serve and everyone eats!

lenders.name: Vicky and Nicole

lenders.loan_because: Sometimes a little can mean a lot.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit that represents biotechnology and life sciences companies in California. Mary is an amazing first grade teacher.

lenders.occupational_info: I make and sell jewelry and accessories.

lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for children.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: helping others in business is a great way to create real wealth and promote self etsteem and confidence from which everything is possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a company that looks for oil and gas in the US so that we can help America meet its energy needs.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I live a good life and am presently in a position to help others as I have been helped in the past. Lending through Kiva seems to be the best way to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: Time for a change - from construction to personal trainer! Loving every minute of my new career. I'm helping people make healther choices in their lives.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because:
I take money for granted, and I know these people won't. 


"Dedicate (donate, give all) your life to something larger than yourself and your pleasure -- to relieving suffering... happiness lies this way, and it beats pleasure hollow." -- Annie Dillard

lenders.loan_because: I find microfinancing to be the best way to help people short of travelling to them and helping them directly.

lenders.occupational_info: As a kid, I lived in Africa and I am glad I can make a small difference for the people there by these loans!
